CustomField.defaultValue: "You need to claim your Common App application."
CustomField.description: The statement that appears when an external app of the type in this application control is found already existing while the user is attempting to make a new application. This statement is followed by a link to a to claim the external app.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The statement that appears when an external app of the type in this application control is found already existing while the user is attempting to make a new application. This statement is followed by a link to a to claim the external app.
CustomField.label: External App Found Statement
